articles.author: Payton Major, Judson Jones and Brandon Miller, CNN
articles.title: A disastrous megaflood is coming to California, experts say, and it could be the most expensive natural disaster in history
articles.description: A new study by the journal Science shows climate change has already doubled the chances of a disastrous flood happening in California in the next four decades. And experts say it would be unlike anything anyone, alive today, has ever experienced.
